text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's our first day of summer camp,<n>and we've arrived at the
seaside<n>facility where everyone has gathered<n>for some
summertime training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I check in on Mayano Top Gun to see<n>what she's up to in
her free time.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I'm finally done! Freeeeeedom!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Gosh, isn't this supposed to be a<n>summer camp? Why are
they even<n>giving out regular school homework?
choice_data_list:
You did your homework? By yourself? Without
anyone telling you to?

You did your homework? By yourself? Without
anyone telling you to?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hm? Oh, it's you!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Mmhmm, that's exactly right! It was<n>suuuuuper boring, but I
did it! ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, right? Keep the praise coming!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I mean, you said I might discover<n>something new, but I
don't think I<n>have... Not yet, at least.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But still, you might be right, so I<n>thought I'd keep at it for
now!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Oh, right! Since I did my homework,<n>can we do something
together? I<n>wanna go to the beach! That's okay<n>with you,
right?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yaaaay! Then let's—

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Mayano! The teacher told us<n>about you! Pretty
impressive, I have to<n>say.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Huh? What are you talking about?

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Y'know, the pop quiz we had the<n>other day? You used your
own<n>formula to solve the problems, didn't<n>you?

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Our teacher was like, "She always<n>finishes her tests so
quickly. What's<n>up with that?" She even said it's a<n>
surprisingly efficient way of solving<n>the problem.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
R-really? I thought I was doing it the<n>same way as everyone
else...

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
That's probably because you're<n>always sleeping during
lessons. She<n>even wants to show the class how<n>you did it
next time.

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Actually, if you don't mind... I wanted<n>to ask if you could
study with me<n>sometime. Maybe teach me a thing or<n>two?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh, uh... S-sure! Yeah, that sounds<n>good! Let's do it!

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Yay! Thanks a bunch! Y'know, I was<n>always afraid of
talking to you, since<n>the two of us seem so different.

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
But I'm glad I reached out to you<n>today, Mayano! I'll see
you again<n>soon!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Um... I guess we should go?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Mayano grabs my hand and drags<n>me away from the camp.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ...Wooow.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ahhhh! Hey, were you listening to<n>what she said earlier?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: No one's ever praised me forstudying before! And I even madea new friend!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I think I get it now though. My teacher<n>told me to show my
work 'cause she<n>wanted to know how I solve the<n>
problems!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Y'know, until now, whenever other<n>people said they didn't
get something,<n>in my head I was always like, "Why<n>don't
you get it? What is there not to<n>get?"

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But now I see that it's just 'cause<n>we're doing things
differently!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
There are different kinds of formulas<n>just like there are
different kinds of<n>running! That's why people worry...<n>
'Cause everyone has their own<n>style!
choice_data_list:
And if you learn about these different methods
of doing things, you'll be all the wiser, right?

And if you learn about these different methods
of doing things, you'll be all the wiser, right?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yeah, exactly! It feels like my visionwas all fuzzy from some silly clouds,but then they went woosh, and bam! Blue skies as far as theeye can see!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hm... Maybe my reason fordoing homework is different fromeverybody else's too!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Uhhh... So my teacher can know more<n>about me! "This is
how Maya would<n>solve the problem." That's what I<n>
wanna show her!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
And then! And then! Once she gets to<n>know me better, she
can tell<n>everybody about me and how I solve<n>my
problems!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: And then I can make even more<n>friends!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hey, I know I already have my<n>friends and teachers asking
me to do<n>stuff, but... do you think you could<n>give me some
too?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! You could give me, like,<n>running-related homework or<n>
something!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Some kinda special homework just<n>for me...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
It'll be like you're with me even<n>when we're apart! Our
own special<n>connection!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
If I think of homework like that, I'm<n>sure it'll feel a little less
boring! Still<n>boring, but not as much!
choice_data_list: You're one step closer to becoming a grown-up.
You're one step closer to becoming a grown-up.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Really? You think so? Was I being<n>super mature or
something?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Heh-heh... Ehehehehehe... That's<n>right. I'm one step closer
to becoming<n>a grown-up woman!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hey, can I ask you something?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Since I'm being mature... could you<n>give me a grown-up
reward? ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I agree to her request and follow<n>Mayano to the nearby
beach that<n>night.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Whoaaaa! The stars are so pretty!<n>And look at that ocean!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Even the waves! Thesplish-splash is so quiet now! This is the perfect grown-upatmosphere!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I think I saw a nice rock to sit on<n>earlier. Let's go there!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: We can have a nice little chat! Like<n>grown-ups do!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: We head over to the rock, only to<n>find...

text_block_list.name: Boyfriend
text_block_list.text: Close your eyes, my dear...

text_block_list.name: Girlfriend
text_block_list.text: All right...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Eep!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: W-wahhhhh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...And so, Mayano Top Gun awakes<n>the next day with a
slight fever.
